<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mark registers as representing wasm&#39;s value stack. This is a key</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code-compression technique in WebAssembly. We run this pass (and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible, including code emitted by PEI and expanded by late tail</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
